mapper.update: update peisongdian set pei_province_id = #{pei_province_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pei_city_id = #{pei_city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_id = #{admin_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, peisongdian_name = #{peisongdian_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peisongdian_tel = #{peisongdian_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peisongdian_address = #{peisongdian_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peisongdian_comment = #{peisongdian_comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where peisongdian_id = #{peisongdian_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select peisongdian_id, pei_province_id, pei_city_id, admin_id, peisongdian_name, peisongdian_tel, peisongdian_address, peisongdian_comment from peisongdian where peisongdian_id = #{peisongdian_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select peisongdian_id, pei_province_id, pei_city_id, admin_id, peisongdian_name, peisongdian_tel, peisongdian_address, peisongdian_comment from peisongdian
